LUZAKS
ABOUT ME

I was born in Mexico and raised in the forest side of this beautiful country, I learned the value of building things by your own, contemplation and curiosity, luckily, I am obsessed with problem-solving, active learning and cold outdoors. First, this fervor carried me to study physics as career and letters as hobbie, later on, I discovered programming and I fused my big passions, physics, languages, and programming, foremost, I love what I do because I am converting my hobbies in my career path. The next logical step is to go ahead with many things to learn and build using my skills in problem-solving, for game and software development with C/C++, Ruby/RoR, Javascript, my favorite stacks.
